name: Big Sea
description: A balanced American IPA inspired by the sea breeze, with citrus aromas, resinous hops, and a clean, refreshing finish.

name: Stone IPA
description: A classic West Coast IPA featuring assertive bitterness, piney hops, and a dry, crisp malt backbone.

name: Milk Stout Nitro
description: A smooth and creamy milk stout served on nitro, offering notes of chocolate, coffee, and subtle sweetness.

name: Milk Stout Penut
description: A rich milk stout brewed with peanuts, delivering nutty aromas, chocolate flavors, and a silky mouthfeel.

name: Left Hand
description: A full-bodied stout with roasted malt character, featuring flavors of cocoa, coffee, and a smooth finish.

name: Oharas
description: A traditional Irish red ale with gentle bitterness, caramel malt sweetness, and a clean, easy-drinking profile.

name: Death Disco
description: A bold double IPA packed with intense hop bitterness, tropical fruit aromas, and a strong, resinous finish.

name: Jai Alai
description: A hop-forward IPA bursting with orange, tangerine, and grapefruit notes balanced by a smooth malt base.

name: Sierra Nevada
description: A classic American pale ale with piney hops, subtle citrus flavors, and a well-balanced malt profile.

name: Flip
description: A hazy pale ale with juicy tropical aromas, low bitterness, and a soft, smooth mouthfeel.

name: High Hops
description: A high-alcohol double IPA showcasing intense hop bitterness, citrus zest, and a bold, dry finish.

name: Wild Craft
description: A lightly tart wild ale with subtle funk, fresh acidity, and a dry, refreshing character.

name: Hop Adventure
description: A modern pale ale highlighting expressive hop aromas, balanced bitterness, and a clean malt finish.

name: Elvis Juice
description: A grapefruit-forward IPA with punchy citrus bitterness, juicy hop flavors, and a refreshing dry finish.

name: Ipa
description: A straightforward IPA with balanced bitterness, citrus hop notes, and a crisp malt backbone.

name: Mosaic Session
description: A light session IPA featuring Mosaic hops, offering fruity aromas, low bitterness, and high drinkability.

name: Imperial Stout
description: A powerful imperial stout with rich notes of dark chocolate, roasted coffee, and warming alcohol.

name: Moesaic Session
description: A refreshing session ale brewed with Mosaic hops, delivering light fruitiness and a smooth finish.

name: BBN 11
description: A balanced amber ale with caramel malt sweetness, light hop bitterness, and a clean finish.

name: Matiné
description: A bright and easy-drinking pale ale with subtle citrus notes and moderate bitterness.

name: Mosaic
description: A single-hop pale ale focused on Mosaic hops, delivering tropical fruit aromas and balanced bitterness.

name: Fumaconica
description: A lightly smoked lager with subtle smoky aromas, clean malt character, and a smooth finish.

name: Brezza Como
description: A smooth and creamy stout with soft roast notes, mild bitterness, and a velvety mouthfeel.

name: Traçado
description: A wheat beer with gentle sweetness, light floral aromas, and a crisp, refreshing finish.
